channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NV

item.title: Report X-2023120960
item.description:
Report X-2023120960

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-30T17:46:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-18
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package discovered in unload. Package handler informed manager. Manager secured package in hazmat lined tote and delivered package to QA. DescribePack: Cap appears to be loose or cracked resulting in leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Manager secured package in hazmat lined tote and delivered package to QA. QA removed package from belt wearing latex gloves.
